description: Led front-end development for QuantDico and Onima Projects, converting Figma designs into pixel-perfect webpages with React.js across 30 screens.
Improved Onima's user engagement by 35% through animations, SEO optimizations, and performance enhancements for faster load times.
Collaborated with designers, testers, and back-end developers to deliver sprints with a 90% success rate, ensuring timely project completion.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain high-quality deliverables and foster team growth.
Directed the WapiDoc project in Next.js and Node.js, delivering a scalable product serving over 10,000 users.
Developed a real-time React dashboard with analytics, boosting user adoption by 25% through intuitive design and functionality.
Built a Node.js reporting tool with Node Mailer, improving user retention by 60% with automated monthly reports.
Implemented GraphQL APIs for efficient data querying, reducing response times and enhancing system performance.
Designed a health management system in React.js and Django, boosting staff efficiency by 80% with streamlined workflows.
Reduced planning time by 30% by creating technical guidelines and development processes for faster project execution.
Ensured 100% compliance with UK GDPR and the Data Protection Act of 2018 through rigorous security measures.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization protocols to protect sensitive patient data and maintain system integrity.
Developed blueprints and delivered over 20 websites with an 80% client approval rating, meeting diverse business needs.
Implemented responsive designs and optimized websites for SEO and performance, ensuring cross-device compatibility and faster load times.
Created custom WordPress themes and plugins tailored to client-specific needs, enhancing functionality and user experience.
Provided technical support and maintenance for existing websites, ensuring smooth operation and client satisfaction.
Supported a Laravel-based school management system for 40+ schools, improving usability by 30% with intuitive features.
Reduced onboarding time by 60% through comprehensive documentation and training manuals for administrators and sales teams.
Developed a centralized reporting system for administrative oversight, enabling data-driven decision-making and improved efficiency.
Implemented automated testing suites for critical system components, ensuring reliability and reducing the risk of bugs.
Built a recruitment portal hosting 1,200+ jobs, increasing visibility by 15% with advanced search and filtering options.
Implemented resumé parsing functionality and a dashboard for recruitment analytics, streamlining the hiring process for recruiters.
Integrated social media sharing, enabling job seekers to share openings across platforms and boosting engagement.
Developed search algorithms for efficient job matching, improving the accuracy and relevance of job recommendations.
Revamped eCommerce UI/UX for 5,000+ users, increasing checkout rates by 20% with streamlined payment integrations.
Implemented an inventory management system with real-time updates, ensuring accurate product availability and reducing errors.
Developed an automated email marketing system for abandoned carts, recovering lost sales and improving conversion rates.
Created a product recommendation engine based on user behavior, enhancing personalization and driving higher sales.
